name: AR Ghost Smash
description:
AR Ghost Smash
Smash all the Ghost!!!

AR Ghost Smash a fun game.How many can you hit!
Operating Guide：
1) Tap on the screen using your finger.
2) Hit Ghost and you get Points.
3) miss you lost 1 life.
4) Get the target score to pass the LEVEL.
Hope you like this app.
